product_name: Mission Athletecare Endura Cool Towel - Large
long_description: The Mission Athletecare EnduraCool Towel provides an instant cooling effect when it's soaked with water, wrung out, and then snapped in the air to activate its cooling properties. Patented Coolcore(TM) fabric absorbs moisture into the core where radiator-like fibers circulate water and regulate evaporation to create a prolonged cooling effect. When wet, the Mission Athletecare Endura Cool Towel cools instantly to 30degF below average body temperature and stays cool for up to 2 hours. The reusable and machine-washable Mission Athletecare EnduraCool Towel absorbs sweat when dry and offers UPF 50 sun protection.
short_description: The Mission Athletecare EnduraCool Towel provides an instant cooling effect when it's soaked with water, wrung out, and then snapped in the air to activate its cooling properties.
